name: Bring the light
description:
A game made for the Global Game Jam 2018 and the MalagaJam VII.

Join up to 4 friends and rush for transmit the light to your golbet.

Find the light, transmit it to your orb and keep far away from other players to aviod them to steal it! 

If they have the light, catch them before they get to their golbets!

NOTE: Gamepads are required to play.

Music by KRILL AUDIO.

HOW TO PLAY

Use joystick left to move.

Use any button on the gamepad to transmit ligth in or out.

You could use the keyboar for Player 1 and Player 2.

Player1: Arrows to move and Ctrl to transmit.

Player 2: WASD to move and Space to transmit.
